name: decorateConfig

classitems.description: Fountianhead default configurations are targeted at Ember applications and include a sane default for every option with the goal of being able to install and use the addon with zero configuration for simple/standard Ember apps. TODO: Document defaults
classitems.name: defaultConfigurations

description: Handle adding default values to config and validating required properties are present

return.description: Fully decorated and validated project configuration file
